I'm building a social platform that puts: I'm building a social platform that puts people first. No algorithms designed to keep you scrolling endlessly. No selling your data. Just authentic connections and meaningful interactions.
AY Social Media started as a simple idea: AY Social Media started as a simple idea: social media should bring people together, not drive them apart. I wanted to create a space where you control your experience, where your privacy is respected, and where real connections matter more than vanity metrics.
I'm a solo developer passionate about bu: I'm a solo developer passionate about building something different. Something that respects your time, protects your data, and celebrates authentic expression. This is just the beginning of the journey, and I'm grateful to have you here.
Your data is yours. I don't sell it, I d: Your data is yours. I don't sell it, I don't exploit it. I protect it.
I prioritize real interactions over arti: I prioritize real interactions over artificial engagement metrics.
You decide what you see, who sees your c: You decide what you see, who sees your content, and how you engage.
I listen to feedback and constantly work: I listen to feedback and constantly work to make the platform better.
Code is poetry written in logic, where e: Code is poetry written in logic, where every function tells a story and every algorithm solves a puzzle of human need.
In the intersection of computer science: In the intersection of computer science and human experience lies the true art of creation—building bridges between imagination and reality.
Every line of code is a brushstroke on t: Every line of code is a brushstroke on the canvas of possibility. We don't just build applications; we craft experiences that resonate with the human spirit.
Technology is the medium, but the messag: Technology is the medium, but the message is connection. In a world of infinite digital noise, I choose to build platforms that amplify authentic voices.
Every great project starts with a conver: Every great project starts with a conversation. Whether you have an idea, feedback, or just want to connect—I'd love to hear from you.
We believe in transparency, security, an: We believe in transparency, security, and giving you complete control over your data. At AY Social Media, your trust is everything.
Your messages and data are encrypted wit: Your messages and data are encrypted with military-grade security. Only you and your intended recipients can access your content.
We're upfront about what data we collect: We're upfront about what data we collect and why. No hidden practices, no selling your information to third parties.
Manage your privacy settings, control wh: Manage your privacy settings, control who sees your content, and delete your data anytime you want.
We use industry-standard security measur: We use industry-standard security measures and continuously update our practices to keep you safe.
We never sell your personal information: We never sell your personal information
Your data belongs to you, always: Your data belongs to you, always
Private by default, visible by choice: Private by default, visible by choice
Minimal data collection - only what's ne: Minimal data collection - only what's necessary
Delete your account anytime, no question: Delete your account anytime, no questions asked
